index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_phone_key ON public.users USING btree (phone)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX events_pkey ON public.events USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_events_host ON public.events USING btree (host_user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_events_creation_key_unique ON public.events USING btree (creation_key) WHERE (creation_key IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX event_guests_pkey ON public.event_guests USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_event_id ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_user_id ON public.event_guests USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_event_guest_user ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id, user_id) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX event_guests_event_id_phone_active_key ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id, phone) WHERE ((phone IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_event_user_lookup ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id, user_id) WHERE ((user_id IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_phone_messaging ON public.event_guests USING btree (phone) WHERE ((phone IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL) AND (sms_opt_out = false))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_event_phone ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id, phone) WHERE ((phone IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_role ON public.event_guests USING btree (role) WHERE (removed_at IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_invited_at ON public.event_guests USING btree (invited_at) WHERE ((invited_at IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_joined_at ON public.event_guests USING btree (joined_at) WHERE ((joined_at IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_event_declined ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id, declined_at) WHERE ((declined_at IS NOT NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_event_guests_event_attending ON public.event_guests USING btree (event_id) WHERE ((declined_at IS NULL) AND (removed_at IS NULL) AND (role = 'guest'::text))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX messages_pkey ON public.messages USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_event ON public.messages USING btree (event_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_sender_user_id ON public.messages USING btree (sender_user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_event_type_created ON public.messages USING btree (event_id, message_type, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_event_recent ON public.messages USING btree (event_id, created_at DESC) WHERE (created_at >= (now() - '7 days'::interval))
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_event_created_id ON public.messages USING btree (event_id, created_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE INDEX messages_event_created_id_desc_idx ON public.messages USING btree (event_id, created_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_scheduled_message_id ON public.messages USING btree (scheduled_message_id) WHERE (scheduled_message_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_messages_event_host_lookup ON public.messages USING btree (event_id, sender_user_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX message_deliveries_pkey ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_message_deliveries_message_id ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (message_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_message_deliveries_guest_id_backfill ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (guest_id) WHERE (guest_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_message_deliveries_user_id ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (user_id) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_message_guest_delivery ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (message_id, guest_id) WHERE (guest_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_deliveries_message_guest ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (message_id, guest_id) WHERE (guest_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX message_deliveries_message_created_id_desc_idx ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (message_id, created_at DESC, id DESC)
CREATE INDEX message_deliveries_guest_created_id_desc_idx ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (guest_id, created_at DESC, id DESC) WHERE (guest_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_md_user_event_created ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (user_id, created_at DESC, id DESC) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX message_deliveries_user_created_id_desc_idx ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (user_id, created_at DESC, id DESC) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX message_deliveries_user_message_created_id_desc_idx ON public.message_deliveries USING btree (user_id, message_id, created_at DESC, id DESC) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scheduled_messages_pkey ON public.scheduled_messages USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_scheduled_messages_event_id ON public.scheduled_messages USING btree (event_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_scheduled_messages_processing ON public.scheduled_messages USING btree (status, send_at) WHERE (status = ANY (ARRAY[('scheduled'::character varying)::text, ('sending'::character varying)::text]))

CREATE INDEX idx_scheduled_messages_event_trigger ON public.scheduled_messages USING btree (event_id, trigger_source, trigger_ref_id) WHERE ((trigger_source = 'event_reminder'::text) AND (trigger_ref_id IS NOT NULL))

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX scheduled_messages_unique_event_reminder ON public.scheduled_messages USING btree (event_id, trigger_ref_id) WHERE ((trigger_source = 'event_reminder'::text) AND (trigger_ref_id IS NOT NULL))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX media_pkey ON public.media USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_media_event ON public.media USING btree (event_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_media_uploader_user_id ON public.media USING btree (uploader_user_id) WHERE (uploader_user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_media_event_created ON public.media USING btree (event_id, created_at DESC)
